item.title: Flutter desktop mac 隐藏标题栏
Flutter Trouble shoot
item.description: Flutter升级无法翻墙 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 升级没法fq的，运行报错的，可以做以下操作将sdk中 flutter/packages/flutter_tools/gradle/resolve_dependencies.gradle flutter/packages/flutter_tools/gradle/aar_init_script.gradle flutter/packages/flutter_tools/gradle/flutter.gradle 3个文件中的 https://storage.googleapis.com/download.flutter.io 替换为： http://download.flutter.io Flutter upgrade 经常失败或超时
